title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, October 18, 2020
description: It's the birthday of bestselling author Terry McMillan (1951), whose novels include "Waiting to Exhale" (1992) and "How Stella Got Her Groove Back" (1996).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
